name: @ngpakistan/smart-ui
description: Simple UI Components created for the Angular Pakistan Components Workshop

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run link:lib && parallelshell "npm run watch:src" "npm run start:demo"
scripts.build: rimraf dist && ngc && npm run build:rollup && npm run build:copyresource
scripts.build:rollup: rollup dist/smart-ui.js -o dist/bundle/smart-ui.js -f umd -n smart-ui && npm run build:postrollup
scripts.link:lib: cd dist && npm link && rimraf node_modules && cd .. && cd demo && npm link @ngpakistan/smart-ui
scripts.npm:publish: npm run build && npm publish dist --access public

author: Obaid
